author: fielding
msg: I forgot to add the bit that allows the macro to be called more than once.

author: fielding
msg: Eventually we will want to only find openssl once regardless of how
many modules depend on it, so make the check an autoconf macro.
Note that this still isn't being checked "the autoconf way", but it
is better than what we have now.
I'm not sure about the -R stuff, but I am told that Solaris won't
build without it.  This is something that should be tested using
AC_TRY_LINK rather than assuming openssl isn't already on the ld path.

author: wrowe
msg: ISAPIs written for MS may pass 0 as the result code with no adverse effect.

author: rbb
msg: Fix apachectl so that it uses the configure program name.

author: dreid
msg: Pass in the full path for the AP_LIBS so we can always find them when not
